data.name: Aznak Demo
data.detailed_description:
Update Notes

As the game is still a work in progress things are likely to change such as the plot, some story elements and mechanics so please keep this in mind.


About the Game

Aznak is a game created by a fan of RPG games. Utilizing the RPG Maker system they were able to create their own tale and allow others to play through this great adventure. Story Ivan Abel, is a young village boy whose mother was abducted by a mad king and his knights. He must venture around the globe in order to regain what was stolen from him and bring peace back to the world. Gathering companions at different locations to create our cast of party members he is able to experience all different types of regions and cultures. Gameplay Features ・Abilities Learn new abilities by leveling up your characters, who all have different classes and different roles to play in battle. ・Limit Fill your TP gauge and use your Limit breaks to unleash devastating attacks or change the tide of battle. Additional Features ・Achievements ・Autosave
data.about_the_game:
Aznak is a game created by a fan of RPG games.
Utilizing the RPG Maker system they were able to create their own tale and allow others to play through this great adventure.

Story
Ivan Abel, is a young village boy whose mother was abducted by a mad king and his knights. He must venture around the globe in order to regain what was stolen from him and bring peace back to the world. Gathering companions at different locations to create our cast of party members he is able to experience all different types of regions and cultures.

Gameplay Features
・Abilities
Learn new abilities by leveling up your characters, who all have different classes and different roles to play in battle.

・Limit
Fill your TP gauge and use your Limit breaks to unleash devastating attacks or change the tide of battle.

Additional Features
・Achievements
・Autosave
data.short_description: Ivan Abel, a young village boy who's mother was abducted by a mad king and his knights. Gathering companions at different locations to create our cast of party members he is able to experience all different types of regions and cultures. Can they save his mother and the world?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista /7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600GTS or ATI Radeon HD4650 or higher
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound® compatible sound card（DirectX®9.0c or later）
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit / 64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5 2520 2.5GHz or better
  • Graphics: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound® compatible sound card（DirectX®9.0c or later）

data.legal_notice:
The EULA serves for both the PC version and the Smartphone version of the game.
